items.itemDescription: A defect not described elsewhere in the manual such that:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Diffyg na ddisgrifir mewn man arall yn y llawlyfr fel:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: the use of the vehicle or trailer on the road would involve an immediate danger of injury to any person.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: byddai defnyddio'r cerbyd neu'r trelar ar y ffordd yn golygu perygl uniongyrchol o anaf i unrhyw berson.

items.itemDescription: A defect not described elsewhere in the manual such that:
items.itemDescriptionWelsh: Diffyg na ddisgrifir mewn man arall yn y llawlyfr fel:

deficiencies.deficiencyText: the use of the vehicle on the road would involve an immediate danger of injury to any other person.
deficiencies.deficiencyTextWelsh: byddai defnyddio'r cerbyd  ar y ffordd yn golygu perygl uniongyrchol o anaf i unrhyw berson arall.
